languages.text: {n}Висирь долго обдумывает ваши слова, шепчет что-то пустоте за плечом, затем качает трясущейся головой.{/n} "Наша стезя противна тебе, Домин'{name}. Ты то доказал{mf||а}, пройдя путем Матери-паучихи по-своему. Право твое, и выбор мы твой уважаем. Но смерти служителем может стать тот, кто готов принимать ее суть. Ты — принимаешь свою, и обременять тебя догмой своей мы не смеем".

{n}The Vizsier ponders your words for a long time, whispers something to the empty space behind his shoulder, then shakes his twitching head.{/n} "Our thread is repellent to you, Domin'{name}. You proved it by walking the Matriarch's path in your own way. It is your right and we respect your choice. However, only one who accepts the essence of death may become its servant. You accept your own essence, and we dare not burden you with our dogma."

Ты — принимаешь свою, и обременять тебя догмой своей мы не смеем".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Vizsier ponders your words for a long time, whispers something to the empty space behind his shoulder, then shakes his twitching head.{/n} "Our way is repellent to you, Enim'{name}. You proved it by walking the Founder's path in your own way. It is your right and we respect your choice. However, only one who accepts the essence of death may become its servant. You accept your essence, and we dare not burden you with our dogma."

languages.text: {n}Der Wesir denkt lange über deine Worte nach, flüstert etwas in den leeren Raum hinter seiner Schulter und schüttelt dann mit dem zitternden Kopf.{/n} "Unser Faden stößt Euch ab, Domin'{name}. Das habt Ihr bewiesen, indem Ihr den Weg der Matriarchin auf Eure eigene Weise beschritten habt. Das ist Euer Recht, und wir respektieren Eure Wahl. Doch nur, wer die Essenz des Todes akzeptiert, kann zu seinem Diener werden. Ihr akzeptiert Eure eigene Essenz, und wir wagen es nicht, Euch mit unserem Dogma zu belasten."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier ponders your words for a long time, whispers something to the empty space behind his shoulder, then shakes his twitching head.{/n} "Our thread is repellent to you, Domin'{name}. You proved it by walking the Matriarch's path in your own way. It is your right and we respect your choice. However, only one who accepts the essence of death may become its servant. You accept your own essence, and we dare not burden you with our dogma."

Das habt Ihr bewiesen, indem Ihr den Weg der Matriarchin auf Eure eigene Weise beschritten habt. Das ist Euer Recht, und wir respektieren Eure Wahl. Doch nur, wer die Essenz des Todes akzeptiert, kann zu seinem Diener werden. Ihr akzeptiert Eure eigene Essenz, und wir wagen es nicht, Euch mit unserem Dogma zu belasten."

languages.text: {n}El Visir medita tus palabras durante un largo tiempo, susurra algo al hueco vacío tras su hombro y sacude su temblorosa cabeza.{/n} «Nuestro hilo es opuesto al suyo, Domin'{name}. Lo ha demostrado recorriendo la senda de la Matriarca a su propio modo. Está en su derecho y respetamos su decisión. No obstante, solo quien acepte la esencia de la muerte puede convertirse en su sirviente. Usted acepta la suya propia, por lo que no osaremos cargarl{mf|e|a} con nuestro dogma».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier ponders your words for a long time, whispers something to the empty space behind his shoulder, then shakes his twitching head.{/n} "Our thread is repellent to you, Domin'{name}. You proved it by walking the Matriarch's path in your own way. It is your right and we respect your choice. However, only one who accepts the essence of death may become its servant. You accept your own essence, and we dare not burden you with our dogma."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Visir medita tus palabras durante un largo tiempo, susurra algo al hueco vacío tras su hombro y sacude su temblorosa cabeza.{/n} «Nuestro hilo es opuesto al suyo, Domin'{name}. Lo ha demostrado recorriendo la senda de la Matriarca a su propio modo. Está en su derecho y respetamos su decisión. No obstante, solo quien acepte la esencia de la muerte puede convertirse en su sirviente. Usted acepta la suya propia, por lo que no osaremos cargarl{mf|e|a} con nuestro dogma».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールは長い間あなたの言葉について考え、肩の後ろの何もない空間に向かって何かを囁くと、痙攣する頭を振った。{/n}「ドミン・{name}、我らの糸はあなたにとっては忌まわしいものだろう。あなたは自分自身のやり方で女帝の道を歩むことでそれを証明した。それはあなたの権利であり、我らはその選択を尊重する。しかし、死の本質を受け入れた者のみが死の従者になることができる。あなたは自身の本質を受け入れている。我らは我らの教義であなたに重荷を負わせるつもりはない」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier ponders your words for a long time, whispers something to the empty space behind his shoulder, then shakes his twitching head.{/n} "Our thread is repellent to you, Domin'{name}. You proved it by walking the Matriarch's path in your own way. It is your right and we respect your choice. However, only one who accepts the essence of death may become its servant. You accept your own essence, and we dare not burden you with our dogma."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールは長い間あなたの言葉について考え、肩の後ろの何もない空間に向かって何かを囁くと、痙攣する頭を振った。{/n}「ドミン・{name}、我らの糸はあなたにとっては忌まわしいものだろう。あなたは自分自身のやり方で女帝の道を歩むことでそれを証明した。それはあなたの権利であり、我らはその選択を尊重する。しかし、死の本質を受け入れた者のみが死の従者になることができる。あなたは自身の本質を受け入れている。我らは我らの教義であなたに重荷を負わせるつもりはない」

languages.text: {n}宿老沉思了很久很久，对肩膀后面的虚无低语了几句，之后摇了摇他抽搐的头。{/n}“您并不适合我们的丝线，秘者{name}。您以您自己的方式踏上了蛛母族长走过的道路，您已经证明了您的能力。这是您的权力，我们也尊重您的选择。然而，只有接受死亡本质的人，才能成为死亡的仆人。您已经接受了您自己的本质，我们不敢让我们的教条成为您的负担。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier ponders your words for a long time, whispers something to the empty space behind his shoulder, then shakes his twitching head.{/n} "Our thread is repellent to you, Domin'{name}. You proved it by walking the Matriarch's path in your own way. It is your right and we respect your choice. However, only one who accepts the essence of death may become its servant. You accept your own essence, and we dare not burden you with our dogma."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老沉思了很久很久，对肩膀后面的虚无低语了几句，之后摇了摇他抽搐的头。{/n}“您并不适合我们的丝线，秘者{name}。您以您自己的方式踏上了蛛母族长走过的道路，您已经证明了您的能力。这是您的权力，我们也尊重您的选择。然而，只有接受死亡本质的人，才能成为死亡的仆人。您已经接受了您自己的本质，我们不敢让我们的教条成为您的负担。”

languages.text: {n}Le vizir réfléchit longuement à vos propos, puis il murmure quelques mots à l'attention de l'espace vide, derrière son épaule, avant de secouer sa tête chancelante.{/n} « Notre fil vous révulse, Domin'{name}. Vous l'avez prouvé en marchant selon vos propres termes sur les traces de la matriarche. C'est votre droit et nous respectons votre choix. Cependant, seuls ceux qui acceptent l'essence de la mort peuvent devenir ses serviteurs. Vous n'embrassez que la vôtre, et nous n'osons vous imposer le poids de notre dogme. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier ponders your words for a long time, whispers something to the empty space behind his shoulder, then shakes his twitching head.{/n} "Our thread is repellent to you, Domin'{name}. You proved it by walking the Matriarch's path in your own way. It is your right and we respect your choice. However, only one who accepts the essence of death may become its servant. You accept your own essence, and we dare not burden you with our dogma."

Vous l'avez prouvé en marchant selon vos propres termes sur les traces de la matriarche. C'est votre droit et nous respectons votre choix. Cependant, seuls ceux qui acceptent l'essence de la mort peuvent devenir ses serviteurs. Vous n'embrassez que la vôtre, et nous n'osons vous imposer le poids de notre dogme. »

languages.text: {n}Vezir, sözlerin üzerine uzunca bir süre kafa yoruyor. Omzunun ardındaki boş alana bir şeyler fısıldıyor. Ardından titreyen kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "İpliğimiz sizi barındırmıyor Domin'{name}. Örümcek Kraliçe'nin yolundan bildiğiniz gibi yürürken bunu kanıtlamıştınız. Bu sizin hakkınız ve seçiminize saygı duyuyoruz. Lakin yalnızca ölümün özünü kabul edenler hizmetkârı olabilir. Kendi özünüzü kabul edin, biz de dogmamızla size yük olma gibi bir pervasızlık yapmayalım."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier ponders your words for a long time, whispers something to the empty space behind his shoulder, then shakes his twitching head.{/n} "Our thread is repellent to you, Domin'{name}. You proved it by walking the Matriarch's path in your own way. It is your right and we respect your choice. However, only one who accepts the essence of death may become its servant. You accept your own essence, and we dare not burden you with our dogma."
